question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the technology industry over the last year.

subtasks.task: Select company profiles from the CompanyInfo table that belong to the technology industry and are active.
Retrieve Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments) from the CompanyFacebookDetail table for all selected companies in the last year.
Retrieve Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments) from the CompanyInstagramDetail table for the same companies in the last year.
Collect Twitter engagement data (likes, retweets) from the CompanyTwitterDetail table for the selected companies over the past year.
Aggregate and analyze the data collected (from Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter) to find engagement trends and patterns across the technology companies over the specified time period.
